title: Dirty John's Terra Newell -  The Real Dirty John Story, Terra Newell Speaks Out, & The Demise of Dirty John
itunes:title: Dirty John's Terra Newell -  The Real Dirty John Story, Terra Newell Speaks Out, & The Demise of Dirty John
description:
#159: On this episode we sit down Terra Newell. Terra is the daughter of Debra Newell. Debra was married to John Meehan who is the antagonist in the Dirty John series by Wondery and Now a hit show on Bravo. Dirty John Meehan is an alleged con artist and sociopath responsible for the abuse and manipulation of women. Particularly the abuse and manipulation of Terra's mother, Debra Newell. Spoiler Alert* Terra plays a large part in the demise of John Meehan and this episode is a real life accounting of John's demise from Terra's point of view.  

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE
